label: logicB:politics_en
steps: [1] If the party wins a parliamentary majority, then it forms the government.
[2] If the party forms the government, then it controls the legislative agenda.
[3] For every candidate x, if x is vetted by the ethics committee, then x is deemed trustworthy by the party.
[4] If the party controls the legislative agenda and Ms. Lee is deemed trustworthy, then the party will advance Ms. Lee's bill.
[5] The party wins a parliamentary majority.
[6] Ms. Lee is vetted by the ethics committee.
[7] Therefore, the party controls the legislative agenda and Ms. Lee is deemed trustworthy.
[8] Therefore, the party will advance Ms. Lee's bill.
